questions.question: Which of the following is used to measure mechanical strain?
Which of the following factors can affect the accuracy of strain gauge measurements?
What is the significance of a Poisson's ratio in strain gauge measurements?

answers.a: It relates strain in one direction to strain in another direction
answers.b: It determines the electrical resistance of the strain gauge
answers.c: It measures the temperature sensitivity of the strain gauge
answers.d: It represents the gauge's resistance to environmental factors
